name: DSCS
description:
A game concept, was not able to complete it but made in jam essence so it's kinda playable.. Time moves when you move, clear the level to play next one, 
Everything is randomly generated,

  • WSAD - move 
  • Mouse left - attack 
  • R - new map 
    sometimes the first map generated (and other few maps) won't have proper enemies, so you can use the top left button to make new map anytime
